mapper.select:
select issue,starttime,endtime,home_team_name,guest_team_name,home_team_id,guest_team_id,home_half_result,guest_half_result,home_full_result,guest_full_result,had,cg_had,had_h,had_d,had_a,had_h_0,had_d_0,had_a_0,status,leaguename,had_bet from
t_loto_fn_eth t_loto_fn_gto t_loto_fn_uz
where endtime > DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') and (had_bet=1 ) order by endtime aSC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO
t_loto_fn_eth t_loto_fn_gto t_loto_fn_uz
(issue,starttime,endtime,home_team_name,guest_team_name,home_team_id,guest_team_id,home_half_result,guest_half_result,home_full_result,guest_full_result,had,cg_had,had_h,had_d,had_a,had_h_0,had_d_0,had_a_0,status,leaguename,had_bet) VALUES
(#{v.issue},#{v.starttime},#{v.endtime},#{v.home_team_name},#{v.guest_team_name},#{v.home_team_id},#{v.guest_team_id},#{v.home_half_result},#{v.guest_half_result},#{v.home_full_result},#{v.guest_full_result},#{v.had},#{v.cg_had},#{v.had_h},#{v.had_d},#{v.had_a},#{v.had_h_0},#{v.had_d_0},#{v.had_a_0},#{v.status},#{v.leaguename},#{v.had_bet})

REPLACE INTO
t_loto_fn_eth t_loto_fn_gto t_loto_fn_uz
(issue,starttime,endtime,home_team_name,guest_team_name,home_team_id,guest_team_id,home_half_result,guest_half_result,home_full_result,guest_full_result,had,cg_had,had_h,had_d,had_a,had_h_0,had_d_0,had_a_0,status,leaguename,had_bet) VALUES
(#{v.issue},#{v.starttime},#{v.endtime},#{v.home_team_name},#{v.guest_team_name},#{v.home_team_id},#{v.guest_team_id},#{v.home_half_result},#{v.guest_half_result},#{v.home_full_result},#{v.guest_full_result},#{v.had},#{v.cg_had},#{v.had_h},#{v.had_d},#{v.had_a},had_h_0=#{v.had_h_0},had_d_0=#{v.had_d_0},had_a_0=#{v.had_a_0},#{v.status},#{v.leaguename},#{v.had_bet})
